title: Best coffee in Australia: 25 must-try cafes
text:
Proud Mary, Melbourne, VIC

Every good coffee hound knows the simplest way to guarantee a decent cup of coffee is to seek out cafes with a Synesso coffee machine. The mere presence of such a refined piece of equipment recommends the venue as one where the owner is prepared to go the extra mile (and fork out some serious dough) to provide a brilliant brew. What’s more Proud Mary use their machine to brew their own custom blends and single origin beans, which can be enjoyed via cold, drop, V60, AeroPress or classic espresso. Partner with an avocado and kimchi toast or scrambled roti and you have yourself a quintessential Melbourne start to the day. 172 Oxford Street, Collingwood, Melbourne. proudmarycoffee.com.au.
description: We’ve endured the caffeine highs and lows, the jitters, sweats and night terrors to bring you the best coffee from around the country.
